201101.n: PhD Seminar in Finance IV: Empirical Asset Pricing

201701.n: PhD Seminar in Finance IV: Empirical Asset Pricing

catList: This course presents available empirical methods that are used to test the theoretical models covered in FIN618. The aim is to provide an in-depth review of the empirical finance research. Students are expected to understand and apply these methods on selected topics including asset pricing models, portfolio valuation, and time-varying volatility.
